item.title: Apr 17
item.description: Prompt: Act as if you were a seo expert, give me some quality tips on how to create seo-friendly content Apr 17 [!tldr] Apr 17 TLDR Text is too short to sumarize Utilize keywords: The more targeted and relevant your keywords are, the better. Use them naturally in your content but also don’t overdo it as this can be seen as spamming by search engines. Use headings: Incorporate headings in your content to break it up into smaller chunks for easier reading.
